about_the_game:
ATTENTION ALL CITIZENS!


The Colonial Administration is hiring potential new station operators with specifications stated bellow:

  • Age over 26
  • Completed military service
  • No living family members
  • CCR (Citizen Credential Score) over 9.5
  • Clear medical history

YOU ARE ALONE



Embark on a space odyssey and take command of an aging space station. Oversee its operations and make you Empire proud. Your actions will have consequences. You are an important influence over the fate of not only your station but the very planet it watches over.

YOUR MAIN ROLES:


  • Station Operations

Planet Forces are relying on success. Your planet is a vital part of human colonial expansion.

  • Maintain and Protect

From reactor controlling to the life support system, you station is your and your responsibility
alone. Make it right and do not fail!

  • Manage Your Resources

Every component may become important. Store, recycle and repair. Surviving space is not easy.

  • Your Choices Are Bound With Lives
Your position in the colonial exploitation is important. Take actions wisely. The Empire is counting on you!

YOU ARE NEEDED!

The prosperous planets of the inner ring is thankful for your service. Join the Colonial Administration Space Operators Program and secure the future of our kind. Join a camaraderie to fight for human prosperity. Return home with thick bonuses and the everlasting honor.

"Our colonial program is nothing but the reflection our greatness"
14th President Of The Inner Systems
Rufus Collins

content_descriptors.notes: Some choices made in the game may lead to non graphical violences towards non human entities that may be described to the player with text messages

name: Borderline Enigma
short_description: Our Empire is spreading thin through the galaxy. Your responsibility is to assist your comrades on our newly founded colony. Keep your station operational at all cost. Your pivotal role may shape destiny. And don't forget: Humanity Above All!
